entity.name: Latest updates from local US authorities regarding the coronavirus

text:
Great to be on the phone with @VP to discuss the latest updates on #COVID19 in our nation.

We still need all Oklahomans to do their part to slow the spread of this virus. Please take personal responsibility to protect yourself, your family, & our most vulnerable from this virus. https://t.co/1TaRKTOY89
